In the face of a pandemic that has too often led to polarization and fear, these values of unity, kindness and love are more essential than ever. May we never forget the lessons of 9/11. May we always honor those we lost on that day and the families they left behind. 8/

First, we are stronger when we stand together, united in common purpose and clear-eyed about our shared priorities. We still have that common ground today even if it has been obscured by the noisy, polarized pandemic world around us. 4/
